presentationtype.name: Conference
presentationtype.description: Each conference talk is 60 minutes long, these are recorded for Parleys.com and take place on Wednesday, Thursday and Friday. Conference speakers receive a full 5 day pass.

presentationtype.name: University
presentationtype.description: University talks are in depth presentations of 2 x 75 minutes with a 30 minute break in between. They are scheduled on Monday and Tuesday and are recorded for Parleys.com. University speakers receive a full 5 day pass.

presentationtype.name: Tools in Action
presentationtype.description: Tools in Action are 30 minute presentations demonstrating a programming tool. They're scheduled on Monday and Tuesday and are recorded for Parleys.com. Tools in Action speakers receive a full 5 day pass.

presentationtype.name: BOF
presentationtype.description: BOF sessions are 60 minutes long, scheduled in the evening and are informal. These are the only sessions which are not recorded and where you don't need an entrance pass.

presentationtype.name: Quickie
presentationtype.description: Short 15 minute presentations during Lunch breaks and scheduled on Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday. They take place in the big cinema rooms but are not recorded. Quickie speakers need a valid entrance pass!

presentationtype.name: Hands-on Labs
presentationtype.description: 3 hour hands-on sessions, scheduled on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday. They are organized in the BOF rooms during the day but are not recorded for Parleys.com. Hands-on instructors receive a full 5 day entrance pass.
